text: The 1919 Geneva Covenanters football team represented the Geneva College during the 1919 college football season. The head coach was Philip Henry Bridenbaugh, coaching the team in his third year. The team finished the season with a final record of 4–2–2. ==Schedule== ==References== Geneva Category:Geneva Golden Tornadoes football seasons Geneva Covenanters football
title: 1919 Geneva Covenanters football team
